property_history.notes: Father purchased vacant rural land - never developed or built on it.
Father passed away. Land was never his main residence (vacant land).

properties.notes: sold - Inherited vacant land. Father owned pre-CGT (1978). Never developed.

user_query: My father bought vacant land in 1978 for $25,000 and never built on it. He passed away in 2022 and I inherited it. I've now sold it for $780,000. Since the land was bought before CGT, is it still exempt? I heard there's a 2-year rule for inherited property.
